snippet: After the shutdown, the filibusters and years of stalled bills, it was the actual passage of legislation this week that revealed the true depth of congressional dysfunction.
abstract: News analysis; passage of legislation to raise the debt limit, while avoiding shutdown or filibuster, reveals true depth of partisan dysfunction on Capitol Hill; House passage occurred with lowest percentage for a majority since electronic data was first published in 1991, and Senate approval was comparably close.
lead_paragraph: After the shutdown, the filibusters and years of stalled bills, it was the actual passage of legislation this week that revealed the true depth of congressional dysfunction.

headline.main: ‘Vote No, Hope Yes’ Defines Dysfunction in Congress
headline.print_headline: ‘Vote No, Hope Yes’ Defines Dysfunction in Congress
